revised_title: Cobalt Injection Technique for Revealing Neuronal Assemblies in Neuropil
tldr: The authors developed a novel histological technique using cobalt salts to reveal neuronal assemblies within intact neuropil in the insect central nervous system. This method can demonstrate nerve cell constituents of tracts and general features of neuropil architecture, providing a powerful tool for resolving large populations of neurons in the central nervous system of various organisms.
